title: Diff eq.: No context part - a

content.description: Solutions to the differential equation dy /dx=xy 3 also satisfy d2y / dx2 = y3(1 + 3x2y2). Let y = f(x) be a particular solution to the differential equation dy / dx = xy3 with f(1) = 2.
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of y=f(x) at x=1.

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of y=f(x) at x=1.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
